snippet: Iranian rescuers and aid workers are on standby to fly to New York City to provide assistance to those affected by Hurricane Sandy, the head of Iran’s Red Crescent Organization said.
lead_paragraph: Iranian rescuers and aid workers are on standby to fly to New York City to provide assistance to those affected by Hurricane Sandy, the head of Iran’s Red Crescent Organization said.

headline.seo: Iran Offers to Send Emergency Aid Team to Stricken New York
headline.main: Iran Offers to Send Emergency Aid Team to Stricken New York
headline.print_headline: Iran Offers to Send Emergency Aid Team to Stricken New York
